name: Oldetime Knuckle Up Boxing Game & Puncher's Mark
blurb: Groundbreaking, Prizefighting Bareknuckle Video Game, Oldetime Knuckle Up Kickstarter Campaign ~ As Featured on ESPN

rewards.reward: Rope A Dope: ...And we're off the ropes!  Our humble thanks for your support + instant access to Oldetime Knuckle Up Community Forum via our Free  Mobile App to win exclusive Kickstarter game perks, prizes, and more.
Slugger: Exclusive Desktop Wallpaper + You\u2019ll gain Kickstarter-exclusive pre-access to a digital copy of our draft Oldetime Knuckle Up Game rules. Includes also Rope A Dope Rewards.

On the Ropes: You\u2019ll receive a Kickstarter-exclusive invitation to pre-order the Oldetime Knuckle Up game and digital concept book with high-resolution images reflecting the history of Oldetime Knuckle Up from concept to production.

The Candy Cane: Get the 25 page Oldetime Knuckle Up full color character book designed by our extraordinary all-star industry digital artists and Kickstarter-only limited edition Oldetime Knuckle Up Poster autographed by Jean Borgella and the design team.

Going the Distance: You\u2019ll receive an invitation to play and get the Oldetime Knuckle Up BETA game in all of its Bareknuckle boxing chin cracking glory + the first 24 pages of the graphic-intense 288-page Oldetime "The Punchers Mark" Comic Book digital series.

Clean The Carpet: You\u2019ll gain Kickstarter-exclusive access to our private discussion community plus receive Oldetime Knuckle SWAG Bag I (Official Game Poster + One Character Trading Card). Included are all Going the Distance Rewards.

Barnburner: You\u2019ll receive the Oldetime Knuckle Up SWAG Bag II (SWAG Bag I + a Kickstarter-exclusive custom deck of Oldetime Knuckle Up Character Trading Cards + Official \u201cI backed Oldetime Knuckle Up\u201c T-Shirt). Included are all Going the Distance Rewards.

Power Punch: You will receive an extra digital copy of the game, including closed beta access + Oldetime Knuckle Up Extra Game Codes to unlock Kickstarter-only featured scenes + $25 in-game cash to upgrade your boxing character or boxer accommodations in our exclusive Bareknuckle shop. Included are all Going the Distance Rewards.

The Sweet Science: You\u2019ll receive a complimentary code to pre-order the May 5, 2014, full launch ready Oldetime Knuckle Up game and you\u2019ll be the first to receive a pre-release digital copy of Oldetime\u2019s "The Punchers Mark" Comic Book. Included are all Going the Distance Rewards.

Stick and Move: You\u2019ll receive two (2) complimentary tickets to the September 2013 Oldetime Knuckle Up game launch party for the Second Build (You are responsible for your own transportation and lodging costs). In addition, you\u2019ll receive special thanks Oldetime Knuckle Up game credit as a supporter and a digital copy of the Making of the "Oldetime Knuckle Up" Documentary with really cool extras (e.g., behind-the-scenes stills and video footage). Included are all Power Punch Rewards.

Kiss The Canvas: You\u2019ll receive an original Kickstarter-exclusive Mini Portrait of YOU painted by an Oldetime Knuckle Up artist as a distinguished bareknuckle fighter or a distinguished patron based on a 200-word description provided by you (The copyright or trademark to the Mini Portrait character image will be held by Oldetime Sports LLC, and it reserves the right to reject inappropriate, anachronistic, or vulgar content). Included are all Going the Distance Rewards.

Bum Rush: You\u2019ll receive two (2) complimentary tickets to the May 2014 full launch ready Oldetime Knuckle Up game launch party. In addition, you and a guest will be invited to lunch with Oldetime Sports CEO Jean Borgella and key Team Members in DUMBO Brooklyn to hear authentic bareknuckle stories and our experiences within the boxing and gaming industries while you ask as many questions as your heart desires. (You are responsible for your own transportation and lodging costs). You\u2019ll also receive the Digital Oldetime Knuckle Up Soundtrack. Included are all Going the Distance Rewards.

On the Button: We\u2019ll design a Kickstarter-exclusive Oldetime Knuckle Up Game Custom Scene such as a tavern, gym, or mansion that we will name after you (The copyright or trademark to the Custom Scene will be held by Oldetime Sports LLC, and it reserves the right to reject inappropriate, anachronistic, or vulgar content). You\u2019ll also get an original painting of art used in the final game and the Kickstarter-exclusive option to become a scene design consultant. Included are all Going the Distance + Barnburner + Power Punch + The Sweet Science + Stick and Move Rewards.

Counterpunch: We\u2019ll design a Kickstarter-exclusive Custom Figure of Yourself based on a 200-word description provided by you (The copyright or trademark to the Custom Figure will be held by Oldetime Sports LLC, and it reserves the right to reject inappropriate, anachronistic, or vulgar content). In addition, you\u2019ll receive an invite to become a part of a small group of Beta testers for future Oldetime Sports games so we can gain your direct input. Included are all Going the Distance + Barnburner + Power Punch + The Sweet Science + Stick and Move.

Sunday Punch: We\u2019ll design a Kickstarter-exclusive Custom Oldtime Knuckle Up Character in Your Image within the Oldetime Knuckle Up Game as a key Patron or Handler based on a 200-word description provided by you (The copyright or trademark to the character image will be held by Oldetime Sports LLC, and it reserves the right to reject inappropriate, anachronistic, or vulgar content). Included are all Going the Distance + Barnburner + Power Punch + The Sweet Science + Stick and Move Rewards.

Knockdown: We\u2019ll design a Kickstarter-exclusive Custom Oldtime Knuckle Up Character in Your Image within the Oldetime Knuckle Up Game as a Fighter based on a 300-word description provided by you (The copyright or trademark to the character image will be held by Oldetime Sports LLC, and it reserves the right to reject inappropriate, anachronistic, or vulgar content). In addition, you\u2019ll have dinner with Jean Borgella, tour of the Oldetime offices. Included are all Going the Distance + Barnburner + Power Punch + The Sweet Science + Stick and Move Rewards.

Final Round \u2013 The Knockout: You\u2019ll have a Kickstarter-exclusive sparring session with Jean Borgella (I'm getting in shape!) at Gleason's Boxing Gym NYC with a Former World-boxing champion as Referee and dinner for you and a guest with the Oldetime Sports Team (You are responsible for your own transportation and lodging costs). Included are all Going the Distance + Barnburner + Power Punch + The Sweet Science + Stick and Move + On the Button Rewards.
